phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
I thought for sure that I heard a faint voice calling my name.
I wake up in the morning to find a guy sleeping next to me.
My youth is way too depressing...
Could it be that I have hit rock bottom?
Are you leaving for work already?
Do not worry about me, you can chill in here for a while longer.
Oh, please leave the key in the usual place, and do not forget to turn off the AC.
Are you working late again today?
You can come in on your own and cool off if you want.
Even thought it is just a simple morning conversation...
Why does the simple fact that I am having that conversation with a guy make things so depressing?
And in the end, it is just Takemoto and me that are left in the apartment...
Hey, can you open it up over there?
Hasegawa-senpai's homemade soba sure is good!
Although he was depressed when he could not find a job...
He is prospered ever since he decided to carry on his family's business.
He is already in travel brochures and guidebooks for Shizuoka.
Fresh and delicious soba that you have with bowls
Have some freshly made soba with hand-crafted bowls.
Fourth Generation Hasegawa Issai-san (24 years old)
So instead of just inheriting his father's noodle-making factory...
I hear that he is also popular with the tourists.
Soba cups hand-crafted by the fourth generation
They will be the perfect gift...
Orders are being accepted via telephone, fax and E-mail
A set of homemade soba, hand-crafted cups, AND a soba sauce bottle.
We will ship it anywhere within the country, you can even mail-order them!
He sure is a shrewd businessman...
I will be looking forward to your next visit.
I will definitely come back for more.
The recipient was very happy when I gave it to them as a gift.
I need to do my best too.
Well, as her father, I also want Ayu to inherit my store.
Her brother Susumu is incredibly knowledgeable, bus he is a little too fond of sake, and is not quite fit for business.
I am not giving you away to anyone!
On the other hand, Ayu is...
My first grandchild was finally born.
So we are about to celebrate.
Then you have no other choice than this!
It is not that I prefer one over the other.
If we could combine the good in those two...
I wonder if we might be able to become a store so fun that we could beat even the big discount stores.
Now, let us be on our way
I already accompanied you on your walk this morning.
Did not you just eat it?
And I was having a nice dream...
But I wake up looking at the back of a guy's head!
It really filled me with depressing feelings.
There is not a single bit of romanticism in there.
Were you dreaming about your ex-girlfriend?
There was not anything between us at all.
It might be that she actually wants to see you.
Say, Mayama-kun, did you know this?
I hear that when someone appears in your dreams like that...
It is because that other person's desire to see you leaves their body and comes flying into your dreams.
There is no way such a thing could happen.
All right, we are all ready.
What happened to your forehead, Mayama?
It will be a huge boost if we can get this job.
Let us approach it with spirit.
Negotiation passed, will return with chicken-breast jerky for Leader and beer for everyone on the team.
The negative ions in the air after a successful negotiation really feel good.
The beer will feel even better.
Shall we go for a drink?
Why do not we go make a toast?
Are you all right with not even greeting him?
As long as he is doing well.
Alrighty, why do not we go in there?
I feel as if I forgot something...
That is right, it was around the fountain...
I will be back in a bit!
Please start on the beer without me!
tsuyogaru poozu ga yoku niteta futari wa
Acting tough, tough we were really alike,
Last night, I met her in my dreams.
I thought for sure that I heard a faint voice calling my name.
we pushed each other away but then were pulled back.
umareta koro to kawaranai kokoro de
With a heart unchanged since I was born,
Say, Mayama-kun, did you know this?
I hear that when someone appears in your dreams like that...
It is because that other person's desire to see you leaves their body and comes flying into your dreams.
sawattara subete ga kiesou na kimi wo mitsumeteita
I have been looking at you, too fragile to touch.
There is no way that could be true.
yagate kimi wa tori ni naru boroboro no yakusoku mune ni daite
Soon you will become a bird, keeping the crumbling promise in your heart.
What am I getting all excited for?
How long can you remember a voice?
You become worried, and replay it in your head over and over again.
kanashii koto mo aru dakedo yume wa tsuzuku me wo fusenaide
There will be sorrows, but the dream goes on, so keep looking ahead.
I could never meet her again...?
Until the dawn comes dancing down upon us.
Will her figure be the thing that remains until the very end?
Do not get so close to me...
Miwako-san told me that she would give me food if I woke you up.
Is not Takemoto-kun a boy that lives in the same apartment complex as him?
Hey, hear me out, please, Miwako-san, Yamazaki-san!
Do not tease him so much.
Do not worry about it, Mayama.
Consider things like that a matter of personal freedom.
It is pretty common in our industry.
Please print out twenty copies of that.
And the model needs to be finished by 4:00.
Messing with Mayama is so refreshing.
I am going to tell on you to our mama in Tottori!
Older Bro./ Fujiwara Mario Younger Bro./ Fujiwara Luigi
The Charismatic Sisters of the World of Architecture!?
Although Fujiwara Design has always been famous for their family feuds...
It becomes an issue when it gets this frequent.
It is difficult, after all, to have two presidents.
Although holding an office as a unit has become common lately, I am impressed when it actually lasts.
But even when it is going well...
There are cases like Harada Design.
It is been four and a half years already since Harada-san left us, huh?
Together, Rika-san and her husband, Harada-san, would document Rika-san's ideas as he implemented them with a smile on his face.
When he smiled and talked, it made you feel capable of doing anything.
Everyone says that he was an amazing guy...
Nomiya and I were just running errands back then.
And we both admired him a lot.
I thought from the bottom of my heart, I want to be just like him when I become accomplished.
That no matter how difficult my task was, I would still tackle it with a refreshing smile, like Harada-san.
Do not worry, I think you have adopted that trait, Nomiya.
I almost died, but I have got all the documents we need.
No way, I am still far from Harada-san's territory.
After all, Harada-san was a truly amazing man...
I am the only person in this office who did not know Harada-san when he was still alive.
Remember that bowl that you made at your school for that one restaurant?
We have had other customers order that.
Not really, I had a friend of mine make that for me.
There are things I want to ask her to make as well.
Can you introduce me to this Yamada-san next time?
But I will have to talk to her about money...
And the documents this time around are more detailed.
I should talk to her in person...
It will be no problem as long as you give me a budget report.
Please leave the rest up to me.
And there is talk about future jobs...
You are a busy person, Nomiya-san.
Please concentrate on your main task.
You will really have no time to relax if you start working on pottery.
As long as you can give me all the documents, I will discuss it with her tomorrow.
Yeah, she is part of my usual group of friends.
There is a Shinto shrine near my school that is holding a festival.
I will go make more coffee.
First, we need to go get okonomiyaki to suppress our hunger, then...
We will calmly think it over!
The three of us combined only have 3000 yen, so...!
They are causing such a ruckus...
Drinks are cheaper at the convenience store!
Man, it is times like this when I realize...
That it is good to be an adult!
If there is something I want to eat, I can eat it right away!
I no longer have to have trouble deciding or worrying about my wallet!
Oh, no, I cannot hit them...
Mayama-san, please get me one too!
Get it yourself if you are a man!
Why are you only doing it for Yamada-san?!
Man, why do the youngsters make the old people feel so boring?
Well, we figured we have not been to a festival in too long.
Festivals are nice, are not they?
Oh, why do you know my name...?
It is nice to meet you.
Thank you for that bowl earlier.
So you are from Mayama-kun's company.
As to be expected from Nomiya.
Since you were dissuading him so much, he figured you were definitely trying to hide something!
How dare you use such a dirty tactic, Yamada-san is really cute!
You were hiding her from us, were not you?
I am going to strangle you!
Festivals are fun, are not they?
Man, his intuition is especially sharp when it comes to things like this...
What is wrong with just introducing them to each other?
The problem is that he is too cool!
I am sorry, I am at work right now.
Nomiya's never paying attention, so he gets caught up in things like that a lot.
Do not litter in the ocean!
He is the kind of man who does not hesitate to throw a cell phone filled with girl's numbers into the ocean at Shibaura!
He is certainly a big shot then...
That is an act we could not perform even if our lives depended on it.
Such a big shot is too much for Yamada!
He will eat her up in an instant!
He will eat her whole from head to toe!
Calm down, Mayama... you are choking me!
I am fully aware that I am in no position to say things like this...
But I really want Yamada to have a happy life.
I do not want her getting used by guys who would approach her with shallow intentions.
Then let me ask you this, what kind of a guy would not be too shallow?
A person who is serious and tolerant with a steady income, who looks decent but would never cheat...
A person who would treat her preciously for the rest of her life and would never make her cry...
Are you a mother with a teenage daughter?!
You actually think that such superficial data can guarantee a person's happiness?
Hey, Mayama, if you cannot be with her for every festival that will come up in her life...
Then you certainly do not have the right to interfere with her private life.
That you cannot worry about what-ifs when it comes to romance.
Even then, I still wish that I could at least watch over her.
But I cannot say that even this feeling is not just self-satisfaction...
I am sorry for being late.
And I was wondering why I had not seen you two since this morning...
Well, we figured that we have both come to a point where we need to learn how to fill orders for potteries on our own.
But that does not mean you should come without asking me first...
If all of us work together, we will finish sooner.
Should I go fill that bucket?
I will carry it for you.
Why do not you learn a little from them?
No, they are just playing innocent, or rather...
It is rude of you to talk about your seniors at work like that!
Hurry up and put on an apron.
Can you put it on for me?
Do not mess around next to the clay!
If dust gets in, the clay will be ruined!
I have not been punched by a woman since a teacher scolded me in elementary school...
I have not had it happen since my grandma back home hit me...
There is a lot left to do, so let us all work hard.
Once we finish, I will deal with the mess, so please go home and rest, Nomiya-san.
Like I have been saying, why are you so desperate to get rid of me, Mayama-kun?
Quit moving your mouths and move your hands!
No, I am not moving away.
Cannot you listen to what your senior has to say to you?!
In this case, I will just pretend that I cannot hear you.
Taken advantage of by his smiling face
kuchi ni shita sake ni aorarete, oh
Stimulated by the alcohol she drank
The tear that wells up when she is shown otherwise
ki ga sukkari sono ki ni natteru
She would already become all for it
Even if she tries to pretend that it was a dream
His paper tells a different story
The silvery summer's night she was picked up on
She is being constricted by a mistake that will not go away
Next episode: My cowardly self starts running.
